item.title: Why no one reads your tech blog and how to fix that
item.description: You have a technical blog and you might have built it from scratch. You wrote a bunch of great tutorials. Your posts are perfect. You are a smart person and you want to show your developer expertise. There is only one problem: no one is reading what you write. Why? Do you want to know the answer? It’s going to hurt. Here it goes: “No one cares about you.
